articles.title: Greetings to King of Swaziland
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Swaziland
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Mswati III, King of the Kingdom of Swaziland, on the occasion of the 41st anniversary of its independence.
					Kim in the message wished the King greater success in his work for peace and security of the region and the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Gabonese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Gabonese President
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Ali Ben Bongo Ondimba on his election as President of Gabon.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the president good health and happiness and great success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Gabon would continue to grow stronger in the future, too.

articles.title: Cuban Government Delegation Enjoys Extravaganza "Arirang"
articles.content:
Cuban Government Delegation Enjoys Extravaganza "Arirang"
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The government delegation of Cuba led by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla enjoyed the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" at the May Day Stadium Friday. 
					 Watching the performance together with the delegation were officials concerned, working people in the city and Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy. 
					
					 "Arirang", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, makes an epic representation of the gigantic appearance of Juche Korea, which has emerged a dignified and independent power after putting an end to the distress-torn history of the nation, with graceful dances strong in national flavor, dynamic gymnastics, ever-changing background scenes, etc.

articles.title: Government Delegation of Cuba Leaves
articles.content:
Government Delegation of Cuba Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The government delegation of Cuba headed by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla left here Saturday after winding up its visit to the DPRK.
					 During its stay in the DPRK the delegation visited Mangyongdae and the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.

articles.title: Russian Orchestra Gives Its Premiere
articles.content:
Russian Orchestra Gives Its Premiere
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The visiting "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia gave its premiere at the Pyongyang Grand Theater on Friday.
					  Among the audience were Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, Kim Pyong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Literature and Art of Korea, creators and artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe and other national art organizations.
					
					 Valery E. Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials were among the audience.
					
					 The orchestra put on the stage orchestra "March of Victory,"    contralto solo "Habanera" from the opera "Carmen", male tenor solo "Riding on a swing", dance and chorus "Russian waltz" and other colorful numbers. The artistes truthfully represented with high artistry the Russian people's love for the motherland, traditional custom and national emotion.   
					
					 They also staged orchestra of Korean song ""Silk Weaving Girl of Nyongbyon" arranged and conducted by Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra.
					
					 The performance ended with choruses immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and "The Evening in the Suburbs of Moscow." It was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Battle of Dongning County Town
articles.content:
Battle of Dongning County Town
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The battle of Dongning County Town in September, Juche 22 (1933) was wrapped up victoriously under the command of President Kim Il Sung who defeated the Japanese imperialists with his iron will, unparalleled courage, elusive strategy and outstanding commanding art.
					 The President regarded it as a key to expanding the guerrilla base and strengthening the united front with Chinese anti-Japanese army units to hold a bold battle against Japanese imperialism in collaboration with the then National Salvation Army of China. He decided to attack the county town where a large Kwantung Army unit, a puppet Manchukuo army unit and puppet Manchukuo police and self-defense corps were posted.
					
					 He convened a joint meeting with officers of the Anti-Japanese Guerilla Army and the National Salvation Army to work out a detailed operation plan for the battle of Dongning County Town.
					
					 The main thrust of the battle was directed against a two-storied fort built on a mountain ridge outside the west gate.
					
					The President ordered a company of the guerilla army to advance along the main line of attack.
					
					 At 9 p.m. of September 6 a unit of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army which had approached the enemy's line by stealth concentrated its fire on the fort when the President made a signal shot for the attack.
					
					 Embarrassed by the attack, the enemy reinforced its troops continuously through a communication trench and a secret underground passage.
					
					 The President made the guerrilla unit which had stormed into the town blockade the enemy's barracks while other forces bypassed the fort to the north so as to divert the enemy's fire; then he sent in a demolition team to seize the fort by means of a violent bomb attack.
					
					The fort abandoned resistance and fell quiet near dawn.
					
					 The guerrilla main force surrounded the barracks of the enemy in tight formation and mercilessly checked the enemy's desperate attempt to launch a counterattack.
					
					 The guerrilla army units killed or wounded a lot of enemy soldiers and captured war supplies in the battle. 
					
					 The victory won in the battle of the Dongning County Town thanks to the brilliant military intelligence and superb command of the President demonstrated the might of the guerrilla army to the full and dealt a heavy blow to the enemy.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A friendly delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact led by Vice-President Li Xiaohua and a delegation of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Club led by Tran Tho Chu, chairman of the club who doubles as chairman of the Vietnamese Committee for Supporting Korea, arrived here today to celebrate the 61st birthday of the DPRK.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Delegations Arrive
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans' delegations arrived here Saturday on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK. Among them were a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan led by Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Chairman Yang Yong Dong, a congratulatory group of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by Choe Pong Gil, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, and a congratulatory group of the Federation of Koreans in New Zealand led by Chairman Jang Yun Guk.
					 Arriving here on the same day were a delegation of officials of Chongryon chapter led by Kang Myong Su, section chief of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, a visiting group of officials of the Korean News Service of Chongryon led by Vice Department Director Ro Min Ae and a home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan led by Kim Pyong Mun.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts U.S. Plan for Production and Deployment of MOP
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts U.S. Plan for Production and Deployment of MOP
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) --The United States is busy pushing forward the plan to manufacture MOP aimed at destroying "underground nuclear facilities" in the DPRK and Iran.
					 It is said that the U.S. Defense Department had already requested Congress to earmark a necessary fund for equipping B-2s of the U.S. air force with MOPs within one year and that it would entrust Boeing with a task for producing them right after it is approved by Congress.
					
					 The above-said action is a hideous criminal action to put the U.S. scenario for the second Korean war into practice.
					
					 We can not but take a serious note of the fact that the U.S. again announced the plan for the earlier production and deployment of the MOP, presupposing a war against the DPRK, right after the end of Ulji Freedom Guardian, war exercises staged according to a new scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 As well known to the world, the U.S. history is one of aggression and war and U.S.-made super-large bombs earned ill fames for being symbols of massacre and destruction in illegal wars of aggression it waged against sovereign countries after the end of the Second World War.
					
					 During the Vietnamese war the U.S. developed BLU-82 capable of exploding close to the ground after being dropped from the air and destroying all manpower within the radius of more than 500 m. It used this type bombs in killing resistance fighters and innocent civilians in Vietnam. The U.S. dropped these bombs in Iraq during the Gulf War. After the advent of the new century the U.S. developed super-large bombs including BLU-118B whose explosive power is equivalent to that of smaller nuclear bombs under the pretext of a "war on terrorism" and used them in the Afghan and Iraqi wars. The U.S. production and deployment of those type bombs precisely mean a war.
					
					 No wonder, the international community expressed deep concern about the plan for the earlier deployment of MOP when the U.S. announced it early in August just before the start of Ulji Freedom Guardian, denouncing it as a serious threat to the world peace.
					
					 The U.S. moved up the period of equipping its forces with MOP three years as compared with the schedule. The Iranian people hardly repress their indignation, saying that this meant the implementation of its war scenario has been stepped up so much. An Iranian Netizen denounced the U.S. development of the said bombs as "a fanatic act bereft of human reason."
					
					 According to an opinion poll conducted through Internet in China, 91 percent of the respondents asserted the need to "strongly denounce" the U.S. development of super-large bombs. An arms control expert of Tsinghua University said it is nothing but an excuse for the U.S. to claim that the production of the said bomb is aimed to cope with "threats" from the DPRK and Iran, adding that the U.S. would develop new-type weapons even without such pretext.
					
					 Similar voices are heard even from Americans. A citizen of Los Angeles expressed indignation, saying the military is manufacturing lethal weapons by use of the money collected from people as taxes when a lot of people are tightening their belts after losing their jobs due to the impact of financial crisis.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that although the U.S. is vocal about "change" it remains unchanged in its belligerency and that it is an arch criminal harassing world peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. is mistaken if it thinks it can browbeat someone with such new type weapon as MOP being keen on putting military pressure and sanctions against others.
					
					 The DPRK is following the U.S. adventurous war moves with vigilance and will continue taking corresponding measures for self-defence.

articles.title: Struggle against Imperialists'"Globalization" Called for
articles.content:
Struggle against Imperialists' "Globalization" Called for
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Making the whole world independent has become a common aspiration and vital desire of the world people, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 A brisk struggle of the people is now under way worldwide for independence, progress and peace against the imperialists' military intervention and war moves and a struggle is gaining momentum to realize regional merger and integration, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The dynamic struggle for independence against imperialism now under way worldwide goes to prove that no desperate efforts on the part of the imperialists can ever hold in check the advance of history.
					
					 In order to bring earlier global independence it is necessary to defend the cause of socialism and forcefully advance the human cause of independence.
					
					 The imperialists' moves for "globalization" should be decisively frustrated to accomplish the cause of global independence. 
					
					 It is important to shatter the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices and their moves for hegemony and establish a new international order based on justice, equality and impartiality. 
					
					 One should not harbor any illusion about imperialism but resolutely struggle against it, maintaining a principled stand. 
					
					 The world progressive countries and people should attach importance to military affairs and direct primary efforts to the national defence construction to bolster up the nation's defence capability. 
					
					 If the cause of global independence is to make a victorious advance all the countries of the world desirous of independence should firmly maintain independence in their state activities.
					
					 It is the consistent stand and policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to struggle for global independence. 
					
					 The Korean people will as ever wage a dynamic struggle in unity with the world progressives to make a positive contribution to accomplishing the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Great King of Cambodia Sends Large Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Great King of Cambodia Sends Large Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihanouk, Great King of Cambodia, sent a large floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					The delegation of the Royal Palace of Cambodia led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy Prime Minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on Sept. 2 to lay it before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Cambodian King Sends Large Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King Sends Large Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihamoni, King of Cambodia, sent a large floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					The delegation of the Royal Palace of Cambodia led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy Prime Minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on Sept. 2 to lay it before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised in Britain
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on August 25 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Kim Jong Il has upheld President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to army and consistently adhered to it, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il achieved the unbreakable single-minded unity of the party, army and people, something unprecedented in history, and has bolstered up the Korean People's Army politically and ideologically and in military technique, holding fast to the principle that the KPA is the army of the leader, party and people.
					
					 Under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il the KPA has developed into invincible revolutionary armed forces and the DPRK has established a strong all-people and nationwide defence system and had access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence. 
					
					 The Korean people will always emerge victorious under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, it concluded.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Uzbekistan on Sept. 1 to celebrate the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Jo Yun Hae, chairman of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, and other officials and Koreans in Uzbekistan.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Uzbekistan and staff members of his embassy were present on invitation.
					
					 A speaker at the meeting lauded President Kim Il Sung who led the sanguinary armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists to brilliant victory, achieving the liberation of Korea and founding the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is the eternal President of the DPRK, the speaker added, and went on:
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has wisely led the building of a thriving socialist nation, foiling the policy of the imperialists to suffocate the DPRK and their moves for a war with the invincible Songun politics.
					
					 The speaker called on the compatriots to work harder to achieve the prosperity of the DPRK and national reunification, true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then followed a performance given by Korean artistes.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar on work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il took place in South Africa, a meeting in France and a film show in Russia from August 26 to 29 on the 61st birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, at the seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" said that there are lots of philosophies and many who claim to be philosophers in the world but there is no such great philosopher as Kim Jong Il who projected the popular masses as the maker of the social history. 
					
					The director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said at the meeting that President Kim Il Sung built the DPRK into an invincible socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence, guided by the Juche idea. The President's cause of building a rich and powerful country has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, he added. 
					
					 The general manager of "Bneshtorgprom" Co., Ltd. of Russia said after watching Korean film "Mt. Kuwol, a Famous Mountain on the West Coast" that Kim Jong Il is a popular leader who has dedicated his all to the happiness of the people.  
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia 
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries on September 1.
					 The work published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008) clarifies the idea that the 60-year long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory and that of great creation and change during which the Korean people defended the independence and honor of the country and built a socialist country, rich and powerful and prosperous, despite the tempest of the revolution under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and the great party and that a country, though small and backward, can become a developed, dignified and strong country when it has a great leader and great party.
					
					 The work also indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding high the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Armas modernas no son omnipotentes, advierte ATCC
articles.content:
Armas modernas no son omnipotentes, advierte ATCC
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos se apresura a fabricar la nueva bomba "MOP" capaz de destruir las "instalaciones nucleares subterraneas" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e Iran.
					El Pentagono pidio ya al Congreso el egreso del presupuesto necesario para posibilitar dentro de un ano la carga de esa bomba en los bombarderos estrategicos Stealth "B-2" de la aviacion norteamericana.
					
					Segun trascendidos, el Pentagono confiaria esa tarea a la corporacion "Boeing" tan pronto como su peticion fuera aceptada por el Congreso.
					
					El fanatismo de EE.UU. por producir y ubicar la "MOP" constituye un infame acto criminal para implementar su plan de provocacion de la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					Lo grave del caso es que EE.UU. anuncio otra vez el plan de produccion precipitada y colocacion de la "MOP", cuya premisa es la guerra contra la RPDC, coincidiendo con el fin del ejercicio "Ulji Freedom Guardian" que se libro segun el nuevo guion de la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					Como ya conoce todo el mundo, la historia de EE.UU. es la de agresiones y guerras. 
					
					Las bombas supergrandes de EE.UU. han sido simbolos de matanza y destruccion en las ilegales guerras de agresion desatadas contra los Estados soberanos despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					En el periodo de la guerra vietnamita, EE.UU. desarrollo la nueva bomba "BLU-82", que luego de ser lanzado desde el aire, explota al ras de la tierra aniquilando a todos los efectivos dentro de mas de 500 m.
					
					Muchos combatientes insurgentes y habitantes inocentes de Vietnam fueron las victimas de esa bomba.
					
					Ella fue usada tambien contra Iraq durante la Guerra del Golfo. 
					
					En el nuevo siglo, bajo el rotulo de la "guerra antiterrorista", EE.UU. desarrollo "BLU-118B" y otras bombas supergrandes con poder explosivo equivalente a la bomba nuclear de pequeno tamano y las esta utilizando en las batallas en Afganistan e Iraq.
					
					En ese sentido, la produccion y la colocacion de las bombas supergrandes de EE.UU. significan la guerra.
					
					Por eso, cuando EE.UU. publico el plan de colocacion de bomba mencionada a principios de agosto en visperas del inicio de "Ulji Freedom Guardian", la sociedad internacional expresa seria preocupacion calificandolo de grave amenaza a la paz mundial.
					
					Los iranies expresan su colera alegando que el ejercito norteamericano adelanto 3 anos el tiempo de pertrecharse con la "MOP" y esto  significa tanta   anticipacion de su plan de guerra. 
					
					Un internauta irani condeno el desarrollo de la bomba supergrande por parte de EE.UU. calificandolo de "acto demencial carente de la razon del ser humano".
					
					Segun el resultado de la encuesta via Internet efectuada en China, el 91 por ciento de los encuestados sostuvieron que "hay que condenar categoricamente" esa labor belicista de EE.UU.
					
					Un especialista en el control de armamentismo de la Universidad Qinghua de China, senalo que si bien EE.UU. esta desarrollando las armas nuevas pretextando hacer frente a la RPDC e Iran, este imperio lo haria aunque no tenga tal pretexto.
					
					Tales voces suenan tambien en el propio territorio estadounidense.
					
					Un ciudadano de Los Angeles expreso su indignacion diciendo que "cuando numerosos habitantes viven con escasez economica siendo despedidos debido al impacto de la crisis financiera, el circulo militar fabrica las armas letales con el dinero de los contribuyentes".
					
					La realidad muestra claramente que aunque EE.UU. habla tanto del "cambio", no ha cambiado en nada su caracter belicista y este imperio es el autor que destruye la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Esta equivocado EE.UU. que intenta asustar a alguien con las nuevas armas como "MOP" prefiriendo la presion militar y la sancion.
					
					La RPDC observa con vigilancia las aventureras maniobras belicas de EE.UU. y seguira tomando las contramedidas autodefensivas correspondientes.

articles.title: Delegacion gubernamental de Cuba presencia la funcion "Arirang"
articles.content:
Delegacion gubernamental de Cuba presencia la funcion "Arirang"
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica de Cuba presidida por el canciller Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla presencio la vispera en el Estadio Primero de Mayo la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang".
					La disfrutaron tambien los funcionarios correspondientes, los trabajadores capitalinos, el embajador Jose Manuel Galego Montano y otros miembros de la embajada cubana en Corea.
					
					A traves de elegantes ritmos de bailes de matiz nacional, vigorosos movimientos gimnasticos y la pizarra humana que cambia innumerablemente, la funcion laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung demostro con cuadros epicos el majestuoso aspecto de Corea del Juche que se ha levantado dignamente como poderoso pais independiente tras poner fin a la historia de martirio nacional.

articles.title: Estrena en Pyongyang la "Orquesta del Siglo 21" de Rusia
articles.content:
Estrena en Pyongyang la "Orquesta del Siglo 21" de Rusia
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang la primera funcion de la "Orquesta del Siglo 21" de Rusia, de visita en Corea.
					La disfrutaron el ministro de Cultura Kang Nung Su, el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea, Kim Pyong Hun, los creadores y artistas del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y otras entidades artisticas centrales.
					
					Se distinguian tambien entre el publico el embajador Valery Sukhinin y otros miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea.
					
					La orquesta describio vividamente con altas habilidades artisticas el patriotismo, las costumbres tradicionales de vida y la idiosincrasia del pueblo ruso en variados programas como la musica orquestal "Marcha de la victoria", el contralto "Habanera" de la opera "Carmen", el tenor "En el columpio", la danza y coro "Vals de Rusia", etc.
					
					En particular, fue interpretada la musica orquestal "Tejedora de seda de Nyongbyon" (cancion coreana), arreglada y dirigida por el jefe y director principal de la banda visitante, Pavel Ovsyannikov.
					
					La funcion, que bajo su telon con la inmortal y revolucionaria "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il" y "Noche en el suburbio de Moscu", arranco efusiva ovacion del publico.

articles.title: Norodom Sihanouk envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
articles.content:
Norodom Sihanouk envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el gran rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihanouk, envio un gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana en su pais. 
					La delegacion del Ministerio del Palacio Real del gobierno del Reino de Camboya, presidida por el vicepremier encargado de este palacio, Kong Sam Ol, visito el dia 2 la embajada coreana y coloco el cesto al pie de los retratos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rey camboyano envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
articles.content:
Rey camboyano envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del  61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihamoni, mando un gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana en su pais.
					La delegacion del Ministerio del Palacio Real del gobierno del Reino de Camboya, encabezada por el vicepremier encargado de este palacio, Kong Sam Ol, visito el dia 2 la embajada coreana y deposito el cesto al pie de los retratos del Presidente           Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
